analyze_bands: [array], bands for training, e.g. [1, 2, 3]. If not specified, will use all bands.
visualize_bands: [array], bands for visualize, e.g. [1, 2, 3]. If not specified, will use all bands
classes: [int], class count of this segmentation task.
ignore_class: [int], ignore a class, often background. Not required, if not specified, will care about all the classes.
tile_extent: [array], training data extent, [minx, miny, maxx, maxy]
deploy: [array], the element in array should be one or many data_name
use_snapshot: [int], use which snapshot to generate test weight.
batch_size: [int], batch size when training. default to 6
